column4: Are there still plans to replace Firefox with Epiphany in Ubuntu (at some point)?
WebKit fans would say Gecko is a joke
I know developers who have handled the code for each and WebKit is far better (by their testimony).
...and, no, iE is the cause for most of the badly coded pages on the web.
There's no way you can say that's a good thng.
I dispise the simplicity of epiphany, because it lacks common features
Which features do you miss the most?
just use Opera for a while, and you're gonna see what I mean
ad blocking is not there in standard
Maybe there's a case to make to the Epiphany guys?
a lot of small things I do not remember atm
Not important enough to remember, hmm.
